column5: Looking to add a couple days to my trip........Anybody ever been there? Primarily looking for Lakers on Great Slave Lake or vicinity. Thanks
The guy you want to talk to is on vacation down south right now,but Im sure he,ll have yer answers.  http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=73647
Frontier and Plummer's Lodges... Lac La Martre... Trout Rock Lodge (pike)... all offer short stay packages I believe, and depart/return via Yellowknife.
